tag_list: alex-griffin, alex, griffin, alexgriffin, bouf, bouf-com, entrepreneur, investment, investor, shopping-club, designer, marketplace, curated
overview:
Alex Griffin is a london-based entrepreneur interested in marketplaces, ecommerce and the design sector. He is the founder and CEO of Bouf.com, a curated marketplace and shopping club making it easy to buy unique, design-led and personalised accessories from over 2000 boutiques and designer-makers .

Alex received the Shell LiveWire Entrepreneur of the Year award in 2007, for London and the South. He subsequently launched Joolia.com - a marketplace focusing on jewellery and fashion accessories, and 1 year in was rolled, along with competitor Glimpse Online, into Bouf.com.

Alex is looking for talented individuals to work with, and is concentrating on building the Bouf.com team, developing a world class product and nurturing Bouf into a global brand.
